attributes.action: Create Legislation to Make it A Criminal Offence to threaten/obstruct/assault or intimidate members of NHS staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All too often we hear about how the dedicated hard-working people of the NHS are subject to violent/abusive/aggressive patients. It is already a criminal offence to obstruct or assault a police officer so why not NHS staff too.
